validators.message: You indicated patient on tb treatment, indicate start date.
You indicated patient is not on tb treatment, therefore start date should not be indicated.
Patient on TB Treament. Please provide adherence history.

answers.label: New exposure to household contact with TB

validators.message: You indicated patient is stopping, changing or re-dosing tb medication, therefore reason should be selected.
You indicated patient is not stopping, changing or re-dosing tb medication, therefore reason should not be selected.
You indicated patient completed tb medication. Please indicate date completed.
You indicated patient did not completed tb medication, therefore date completed is not to be indicated.
You indicated patient changed tb medication because of toxicity. Please select toxicity cause.
You indicated patient did not change tb medication because of toxicity, therefore cause should not be selected.

questions.label: If toxicity, please provide cause: Other (specify):

validators.message: You indicated patient changed tb medication because of other toxicity. Please indicate the other cause.
You indicated patient did not change tb medication because of other toxicity, therefore other cause should not be indicated.
You indicated patient is starting tb medication, therefore reason should be selected.
You did not indicate re/start tb medication, therefore reason should not be selected.
